last_episode_to_air.name: Ball's Well That Friends Well (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: After falling into the Land of Shadows, Randy and Howard must find their way back to Norrisville to stop Evil Julian.

name: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
overview: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja is an American animated television series created by Jed Elinoff and Scott Thomas for Disney XD. It is produced by Titmouse, Inc. and Boulder Media Limited. Many of the character designs were supplied by Jhonen Vasquez, the creator of Invader Zim. The series premiered on September 17, 2012.

episodes.name: Last Stall On the Left
episodes.overview: Randy Cunningham, a 9th grade kid, becomes a ninja and is to protect Norisville High School.

episodes.name: Got Stank
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard try to get into a cool zone in the bleachers when watching their school play basketball. When one of the triangle-playing band members is fired, The Sorcerer turns him into a ferocious monster.

episodes.name: So U Think U Can Stank
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard become judges for their school's talent show and Randy tells Howard that he should be "the mean judge." But the Sorcerer takes this chance and makes all the failing acts monsters.

episodes.name: McFists of Fury
episodes.overview: When Randy discovers that the Norrisville philanthropist, Hannibal McFist, is his enemy, he has a hard time trying to convince Howard that the one they believed to be their hero is actually an evil villain working with the Sorcerer.

episodes.name: Gossip Boy
episodes.overview: Howard accidentally tells everyone on a web show that he knows who the ninja is and he is captured by McFist, who demands that he tell him who the ninja is.

episodes.name: House of 1,000 Boogers
episodes.overview: The Ninja fights a lizard, which copies a sample of his snot. Later Randy and Howard attend a party Bash is throwing, but it's a scheme so McFist can find the ninja by sampling everyone's snot bombs and matching it to the ninja.

episodes.name: Monster Dump
episodes.overview: Randy takes a trip to the town's volcano, but it's probably not going to be a nice stop-by.

episodes.name: Attack of the Killer Potatoes
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard want to win the Science Fair, but will they go too far?

episodes.name: The Tale of the Golden Doctor's Note
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard find a note under their school.

episodes.name: Dawn of the Driscoll
episodes.overview: Randy accidentally brings the mad scientist back to life.

episodes.name: Night of the Living McFizzies
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard wonder why everyone in town is turning into zombies.

episodes.name: Viva El Nomicon
episodes.overview: A Mexican death bear threatens the school.

episodes.name: 30 Seconds to Math
episodes.overview: Randy must find a way to juggle his life as a ninja and his friendship with Howard during the battle of the bands, while McFist tries to use a truth device that will reveal the ninja's identity during the show.

episodes.name: Monster Drill
episodes.overview: After a fight between Randy and Howard, a monster attacks during the school's annual routine "monster drill" where Howard is pretending to be the ninja. Randy must find a way to get to his mask and to apologize to his friend.

episodes.name: Silent Punch, Deadly Punch
episodes.overview: Randy Cunningham looks for the Skunk Pine in order to restock his smoke bombs. When Randy finds the Skunk Pine, it is stolen by Hannibal McFist to use as a Christmas tree party at McFist Industries. Randy also discovers that Howard is at Hannibal McFist's Christmas party when his father's company was bought by McFist Industries. When Randy infiltrates the Christmas party as a Ninja Santa Claus, he ends up fighting a robotic snowman and an army of robotic Christmas Elves in order to restock his smoke bombs.

episodes.name: Stank'd To The Future
episodes.overview: After a power outage at school, a Stankified Monster frozen in ice is freed. When Randy de-stanks him, he and Howard learn that his name is Dickie and his monster form was frozen in ice by the Ninja of 1985. When Dickie (voiced by Bobcat Goldthwait) is saddened by this and how he missed his chance with Tawny (voiced by Annie Potts), The Sorcerer takes the opportunity to re-stank him and find out what is the object of his stank.

episodes.name: Wave Slayers
episodes.overview: The Wave Slayer relays are occurring in Norrisville as Randy and Howard accidentally wrecks the Wave Slayer where an accident injures Buttermaker and causes Howard to take his place. The Sorcerer takes the opportunity to Stankify Buttermaker (voiced by Sterling Knight) into an aquatic monster that attacks the opposing team.

episodes.name: Sword Quest
episodes.overview: Randy must learn a valuable new lesson about respect and humility when after accidentally breaking his sword. He enlists the help of the blind metal shop teacher S. Ward Smith (voiced by John Witherspoon) to get a custom-made sword. Meanwhile, S. Ward Smith's protege Brent believes he was replaced by Howard and the Sorcerer to Stankify Brent (voiced by Jason Earles) into a monster that goes after Howard.

episodes.name: Nukid On The Block
episodes.overview: Franz Nukid, a strange new exchange student, threatens to destroy the Ninja as well as Randy and Howard's friendship which Hannibal McFist takes advantage of.

episodes.name: Weinerman Up
episodes.overview: When Randy and Howard's video game battle gets out of hand, the Ninja must save the town from a giant robot.

episodes.name: Evil Spirit Week
episodes.overview: School Spirit Week turns into a disaster after Howard is possessed by a mythical demon bird called the Tengu which Randy releases.

episodes.name: Der Monster Klub
episodes.overview: When Randy and Howard are forced to share a lunch table with the outcast group "Der Monster Klub", Randy accidentally tells them how to get people stank'd, and they realize these oddballs are playing a dangerous game that could destroy the whole school even when the Sorcerer gets involved when some of the members get depressed.

episodes.name: Grave Puncher: The Movie!
episodes.overview: During the premiere a new 6D film, the movie's title character comes to life and threatens to destroy Norrisville.

episodes.name: Escape from Detention Island
episodes.overview: Randy helps students escape from Detention Island.

episodes.name: Bash Johnson: 11th Grade Ninja
episodes.overview: Bash is thought to be the ninja.

episodes.name: Shoob Tube
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard seek revenge on a French exchange student who stole their Internet video fame - only to cause him to stank out and create a scene they weren't expecting.

episodes.name: Stanks Like Teen Spirit
episodes.overview: When a robot disguised as a rival school's chess team member crushes Norrisville High's record - and their spirit, a mass stanking breaks out.

episodes.name: Raiders of the Last Nomicon
episodes.overview: When Randy loses the NinjaNomicon, he must save it before hundreds of years of Ninja wisdom is revealed to his enemies.

episodes.name: Rise of the Planet of the Robo-Apes
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard are eager to ride a new roller coaster but first, the Ninja must stop a Robo-Ape uprising.

episodes.name: Secret Stache
episodes.overview: A feud breaks out when Howard is accepted into a school club and Randy isn't. But when Howard is in danger, the Ninja must put aside his grudge and come to the rescue.

episodes.name: Hiphopocalypse Now
episodes.overview: The Ninja accidentally summons a giant monster when he uses an ancient ninja lesson during a rap battle.

episodes.name: Ninja Camp
episodes.overview: Randy must stop a former Norrisville Ninja-turned-nemesis from recruiting an army intended to destroy the Ninja.

episodes.name: McFear Factor
episodes.overview: Randy must go with Howard to CluckFest under the threat of Bash Johnson. This won't be easy for Randy since he is afraid of chickens. Meanwhile, Hannibal McFist and Willem Viceroy III unleash a fear-pooping robotic rhinoceros called the Rhinosaurus that forces everyone to confront their worst fear as part of their plot to find the Ninja's greatest fear and take advantage of it.

episodes.name: Randy Cunningham & the Sorceror's Key
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard must sacrifice everything to prevent the Ninja's ultimate enemy from running amuck.

episodes.name: The Ninja Identity
episodes.overview: During Ninja Day, McFist schemes to steal the spotlight by introducing a new hero - himself; the real Ranginald is in danger of McFist's fury.

episodes.name: The Ninja Supremacy
episodes.overview: When Randy inadvertently mind-wipes himself and develops amnesia, Howard must fill in as the Ninja until Randy can get his memory back.

episodes.name: Enter the Nomicon
episodes.overview: Mac Antfee (voiced by David Koechner) returns to Norrisville as a motivational speaker, only to have Randy reignite his burning desire to destroy the Ninja and take his place.

episodes.name: Swampy Seconds
episodes.overview: Randy misuses his Ninja powers, and the Nomicon refuses to let him Ninja out and rescue Howard from a psychotic Cajun trapper named Catfish Booray.

episodes.name: McSatchle
episodes.overview: When Randy and Howard don’t have enough money to buy a McSatchle, they get jobs at McFist-O-Plex and Howard becomes Randy’s manager.

episodes.name: Fart-Topia
episodes.overview: When Randy helps Hannibal McFist’s hippie brother Terry (voiced by Steve Zahn) take control of McFist Industries, Whoopee World is turned into a fart-powered nightmare.

episodes.name: The McHugger Games
episodes.overview: In order to score a limousine ride with soccer super star Pitch Kickham (voiced by Simon Pegg), the Ninja swipes a pair of shorts to help him win a shoot-out competition. When McFist sends an I.D. Bot to find the shorts, Randy's identity is compromised and Howard must take Randy's place in the competition.

episodes.name: McFreaks
episodes.overview: The McFreak Show arrives in town and Randy is convinced that he wants a McFreak as a pet. But when the McFreaks go on a rampage, he realizes that wild animals don't really make the best pets.

episodes.name: Sorcerer in Love
episodes.overview: Randy, Howard, and all the boys at Norrisville High are entranced by the new girl in school named Amanda Levay. Little do they know that she's the Sorceress (voiced by Jennifer Tilly), the Sorcerer's long lost love in disguise where she has plans to free the Sorcerer.

episodes.name: Pranks for Nothing
episodes.overview: Coach Green brings back an old Norrisville High tradition, Prank Day.

episodes.name: Lucious O'Thunderpunch
episodes.overview: During "Ninja Day" McFist schemes to steal the spotlight by introducing a new hero - Himself.

episodes.name: Bring Me the Head of Ranginald Bagel
episodes.overview: When Randy lies that his name is Ranginald Bagel (voiced by Gilbert Gottfried), he puts the real Ranginald Bagel in danger of McFist's fury.

episodes.name: Weinerman Tested, Cunningham Approved
episodes.overview: Due to their ability to break McFist products, the boys become product testers at McFist Industries and inadvertently help Viceroy an indestructible ninja-seeking robot.

episodes.name: Sorcerer in Love 2: Sorceress's Revenge
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard follow Theresa Fowler (voiced by Sarah Hyland) and the rest of their classmates to a cool new club downtown only to discover that the Sorceress (voiced by Jennifer Tilly) has returned to seek revenge on the Ninja.

episodes.name: McOne Armed and Dangerous
episodes.overview: During the 50th Anniversary Celebration of McFist Industries, the Ninja outs McFist as a villain to the entire town. But with his cover blown, McFist is finally able to focus all of his power on destroying the Ninja.

episodes.name: Shloomp! There It Is!
episodes.overview: Randy becomes so dependent on the Nomicon’s wisdom that he goes to it for advice on everything. To teach him a lesson, the Nomicon traps him inside and puts an alternate consciousness in Randy’s body, forcing Randy to try to find a way out of this mess.

episodes.name: Randy Cunningham: 13th Century Ninja (1)
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard accidentally stumble back in time and accidentally stop the original Ninja from stopping the Sorcerer.

episodes.name: Randy Cunningham: 13th Century Ninja (2)
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard must work the the original Ninja defeat the Sorcerer in order to have a present to return to.

episodes.name: Flume-Igation
episodes.overview: When Randy and Howard don't want to admit they are too scared to ride Norrisville's newest waterslide, the Ninja sabotages it and inadvertently releases one of Viceroy's earliest creations.

episodes.name: On the Poolfront
episodes.overview: On the hottest day of the year, Mort Weinerman is finally able to build Randy and Howard's dream pool, thanks to his new promotion he received for building a Ninja that destroys robots for McFist.

episodes.name: Welcome Back Catfish
episodes.overview: Catfish Booray returns to Norrisville as a substitute teacher under control of the Sorcerer.

episodes.name: All the Juice that's Fish to Swim
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard put investigative reporter Debbie Kang on the trail of the Ninja's secret identity.

episodes.name: Julian's Birthday Surprise
episodes.overview: Randy brings the Sorcerer's ball to Julian's magic-themed birthday party and accidentally unleashed its power.

episodes.name: True Bromance
episodes.overview: Howard finds some other friends to hang with, causing a jealous Randy to plot a way to drive a wedge between Howard and his new bros.

episodes.name: Unstank My Hart
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard are psyched to rock out with pop star Levandar Hart, but they are unaware that Levandar is secretly plotting his revenge for kicked out of their band.

episodes.name: Whoopee 2: The Wrath of Whoopee 2
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard rescue their favorite animatronic rock star from Whoopee World, only to discover he isn't who he seems to be.

episodes.name: M-m-my Bologna
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard must take care of a bologna baby for science class, and it mysteriously comes to live.

episodes.name: Everybody Ninj-along
episodes.overview: When Bucky creates a ninja theme song that the Ninja can't stand, Ninja's attempts to shut it down only makes it more popular.

episodes.name: Fudge Factory
episodes.overview: Insulted that Howard doesn't think he's a good liar, Randy goes to extreme lengths to prove to his friend wrong and puts both of them in grave danger.

episodes.name: Best Buds
episodes.overview: Worried about losing the "Best Bud" food-tasting competition, Randy uses the Nomicon to cheat and give himself super-senses.

episodes.name: Otto Know Better
episodes.overview: When Randy finds and falls in love with Viceroy's beloved pet Otto, he refuses to give it back and puts Norrisville in danger.

episodes.name: Brolateral Damage
episodes.overview: Randy goes undercover to infiltrate Bash's inner circle so he can discover the secret behind McFist's next Ninja-destroying plan.

episodes.name: The Curse of Mudfart
episodes.overview: Randy can't resist tormenting Howard on Halloween by telling the scary story of the terrifying Mudfart and inadvertently brings the maniacal Mudfart back to life.

episodes.name: Let the Wonk One In
episodes.overview: Randy unleashed the terrifying orange Halloweenja suit from the Nomicon and soon discover that it's a force he can't control.

episodes.name: Shoot First, Ask Questions Laser
episodes.overview: Wonk laser tag players Randy and Howard decide to use Ninja-ing to level the playing field.

episodes.name: Ninjception
episodes.overview: Stuck in a dream-within-a-dream-within-a-dream, Randy must figure out how to escape the loop.

episodes.name: Happy Hanukkah, Howard Weinerman
episodes.overview: Howard finds out about the true meaning of Hanukkah by saving Greg's Game Hole.

episodes.name: Snow Klahoma!
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard go to Snow-klahoma. However, Randy leaves the Nomicon at school on purpose to prevent his ninja duties from distracting them.

episodes.name: Randy Cunningham's Day Off
episodes.overview: Randy’s fake sick day creates more trouble than he bargained for after Howard attempts to get his best friend back to school to avoid eating lunch by himself.

episodes.name: Bro-ing Down the House
episodes.overview: Even though he knows he shouldn’t, Randy breaks into McFist’s empty house to retrieve a lost boomerang, putting himself and Howard in grave danger.

episodes.name: Living in Shooblivion
episodes.overview: Ninja becomes blinded by his own doodles and seeks the help of S. Ward Smith, the blind sword smith of Norrisville.

episodes.name: McNinja - Brought to You by McFist
episodes.overview: Ninja learns the dangers of selling out when he endorses every business in Norrisville, including McFist Industries.

episodes.name: Mastermind of Disastermind
episodes.overview: When Randy brags about his Ninja skills, Howard sets out to prove that he is a true mastermind that could beat the Ninja.

episodes.name: The Brawn Also Rises
episodes.overview: When Randy and Howard’s fake “Chuck-a-Cabra” video gives them instant celebrity, it draws the attention of monster hunter Brawn Brickwall who tries to horn in on their glory by noogie-ing the beast.

episodes.name: Debbie Meddle
episodes.overview: Debbie discovers that Randy is the ninja and reveals it to the world.

episodes.name: Aplopalypse Now
episodes.overview: Randy learns of a guardian of one the the Sorcerer's orbs and visits him, learning that it's Plop-Plop, the original Ninja's best friend.

episodes.name: Rorg: A Hero of a Past
episodes.overview: Viceroy, while sick, steals ideas from Rorg: Hero of the Past cartoon marathon for robots to destroy the ninja with so he can go home to rest.

episodes.name: Mort-al Combat
episodes.overview: Mort Weinerman becomes paranoid of the Ninja being out to get him and his family. Hoping to protect his family he attacks first.

episodes.name: Wonkin' for the Weekend
episodes.overview: The principal starts Saturday classes to make up the class time lost due to Ninja incidents. Howard suddenly gets smarter and smarter, and eventually takes out his rage on the school.

episodes.name: Ninjafan
episodes.overview: Randy breaks up his friendship with Howard, and starts hanging out with a female Ninja fan named Rachel.

episodes.name: When Howie Met Randy
episodes.overview: 8 years ago, Howard and Randy meet up and sneak out of daycare to see the Ninja in action.

episodes.name: Bro Money Bro Problems
episodes.overview: Howard has been selling off the Ninja's weapons he leaves behind after a fight. Unfortunately, Viceroy buys them and builds a Ninjabot to destroy the Ninja.

episodes.name: The Three Mascot-teers
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard become the new mascots for Norrisville High soccer, only to learn just Howard can be the mascot.

episodes.name: Escape from Scrap City
episodes.overview: McFist and the Ninja get trapped and lost in Scrap City, a dump for all the faulty machines made by McFist.

episodes.name: The Space Cow-Bros
episodes.overview: For Howard's birthday, Randy takes him out for a ride on a space shuttle.

episodes.name: The Fresh Principal of Norrisville High
episodes.overview: Principal Slimovitz is fired thanks to Randy and a computerized principal is brought in for his replacement, leading to everyone in the school being brainwashed.

episodes.name: The Prophecy of Hat Sword
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard have to read a huge poem to pass an English test and not be split up for the rest of high school.

episodes.name: Fake Fight for Your Right to Party
episodes.overview: Randy and Howard pretend to defeat one of McFist's machines to get into a party and become popular.

episodes.name: McCluckerbusters
episodes.overview: After finding a beak in thier food, Randy and Howard demand free food and a meeting with Mr. McFlubbuster, only to end up in a war between fast food joints.

episodes.name: Let Them Eat Cake Fries
episodes.overview: The school puts a ban on cake fries, and Randy leads the students into a protest. Randy knows the Ninja shouldn't be involve, but finds the folk hero Le Beret attacking the school for the protest.

episodes.name: Club Ninja-dise
episodes.overview: While enjoying Spring Break, Randy sends McFist flying off the reosrt island, which causes him to raid the island as pirates.

episodes.name: To Smell and Back
episodes.overview: Howard rips a loud one next to the Ninja, leading to the Ninja being too distracted in fights and getting captured.

episodes.name: Big Trouble in Little Norrisville
episodes.overview: Howard buys an idol of infinite wishes during a field trip to Little Norrisville, losing himself to the power it gives him.

episodes.name: Winner Takes Ball
episodes.overview: The power ball leaks into the water supply, during everyone but Randy and Howard into zombies that evil Julian controls to find the power balls.

episodes.name: Ball's Well That Friends Well (1)
episodes.overview: Randy discovers his family is moving, so he goes to defeat Evil Julian once and for all before they leave.

episodes.name: Ball's Well That Friends Well (2)
episodes.overview: After falling into the Land of Shadows, Randy and Howard must find their way back to Norrisville to stop Evil Julian.
